document.full_text: anaheim ducks winger corey perry smashed a hat-trick to become the first player to reach 50 goals in the nhl this season in a 6-2 thrashing of the san jose sharks.
document.title: perry first to 50 with hat-trick for rampant ducks
lines_and_colors: anaheim ducks winger corey perry smashed a hat-trick to become the first player to reach 50 goals in the nhl this season in a 6-2 thrashing of the san jose sharks.
